body_html:
It's certainly possible to add richer error handling, though it might end up not being ideal to add a callback to Dataset.ignore_errors() because at that point in the input pipeline you only have an error message (or the successfully transformed data), and it's not necessarily obvious what input element caused the error.

Can you sketch out in more detail your ideal interface for a method like this?
body_text:
It's certainly possible to add richer error handling, though it might end up not being ideal to add a callback to Dataset.ignore_errors() because at that point in the input pipeline you only have an error message (or the successfully transformed data), and it's not necessarily obvious what input element caused the error.

body:
It's certainly possible to add richer error handling, though it might end up not being ideal to add a callback to `Dataset.ignore_errors()` because at that point in the input pipeline you only have an error message (or the successfully transformed data), and it's not necessarily obvious what input element caused the error.

Can you sketch out in more detail your ideal interface for a method like this?
